thoughts.description: This cluster focuses on ensuring the aerospace systems' safety through reliability and fault tolerance measures.
Focuses on the adherence to regulatory standards and the rigorous certification processes necessary for aerospace software.
Covers the essential aspects of how various software and hardware components work together seamlessly and interact with other systems.
This cluster involves the technical requirements for software to operate efficiently under strict resource constraints and includes real-time processing needs.
Addressing the challenges of securing aerospace systems from threats and the ongoing need for software maintenance.
